name: Twin Cities
description:
Made for GMTK GameJam within the first 8 hours. There are known issues with scaling UI. 

Rules:

 Try and balance two cities' food while production and people try and change it. Game ends when food reaches 0, while food will be stolen when over 20. 

Theme:

This game focuses on two connected cities, hence the theme. My thoughts were to create connections through economy instead of physics-based. 

Controls:

Left-click to send resources left, right-click to send resources right. 

Assets:

All code and art were written or drawn by myself using Unity. The sound was free assets from Zapsplat.
